name: Monochrome (Jaded Cat)
description:
Monochrome is an old project of mine which I made as a graduation project for school. I don't plan on updating it or adding content, but just wanted to get it out there after all this time.

When it comes to credits, I made all of the content present in this game on my own except for the character's sprites and the particle effects linked to their movements which were made by Ojiro Fumoto (@moppin) for an actual game called "Downwell".

I'm currently in college studying video games (among other things) and plan on making more in the future with the added benefit of everything I've learned.

I've enabled donations for this project, but I don't see it as a product and rather would only encourage people to donate if they wish to support me directly.

I hope you enjoy, thanks.
-JadedCat54
